name: Telecable Corporation et al., Appellants v. Scranton

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
parties: Telecable Corporation et al., Appellants v. Scranton.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed; costs on appellants.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Joseph E. Gallagher, with him O’Malley, Mor gam, Bour & Gallagher, for appellants.
Morey M. Myers, with him Morris B. Gelb, David J. Reedy, Jr., Assistant City Solicitor, John J. Dunn, Sr., City Solicitor, and Gelb & Myers, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Telecable Corporation et al., Appellants v. Scranton.
Argued January 11, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Joseph E. Gallagher, with him O’Malley, Mor gam, Bour & Gallagher, for appellants.
Morey M. Myers, with him Morris B. Gelb, David J. Reedy, Jr., Assistant City Solicitor, John J. Dunn, Sr., City Solicitor, and Gelb & Myers, for appellees.
October 8, 1971:
